ERROR.EMAIL: No account exists for this email.

EULA.TITLE: MyBroodMinder.com EULA (End User License Agreement) v1.1
EULA.DESCRIPTION: We ask then you agree to the following statements to use this SaaS beekeeping software:
EULA.POINT_1: I am placing the data that I upload or enter into this service into the Public Domain. As such, mybroodminder.com may use the data, in anonymous form, to share with the general public.
EULA.POINT_2: I understand that mybroodminder.com will use best efforts to not expose any Personally identifiable information (PII) such as my username, password, and postal code, but that mybroodminder.com can not be held responsible for hacking or other methods of data exposure.
EULA.POINT_3: I understand that mybroodminder.com will use best efforts to store and backup all data uploaded or entered into it, but that mybroodminder.com can not be held responsible for data loss.
EULA.POINT_4: I understand that mybroodminder.com is a separate company from other vendors that may integrate their devices into mybroodminder.com, and that mybroodminder.com is not liable for those vendors actions.
EULA.POINT_5: I understand that mybroodminder.com is a place for beekeepers and entomologists to exchange information, and I will conduct myself in a courteous manner at all times. I understand failing to do so may cause my account to be terminated at the sole digression of the staff of mybroodminder.com.

ERROR.DUPLICATE: The email address is already in use by another account.
ERROR.EMAIL: The email address is badly formatted.

WEATHER_INFO.TITLE: WeatherSource Weather
WEATHER_INFO.TEXT: This weather data is coming from WeatherSource. It is based off of the postal code provided on your apiary.

RESOURCES.TITLE: Resources
RESOURCES.SUBTITLE: Here you will find many resources so that you can start contributing to learning more about our bees.
RESOURCES.DESCRIPTION: Thank you for joining the BroodMinder movement where we are learning and sharing information in order to improve our understanding and management of our precious honeybees.
RESOURCES.DESCRIPTION_1: Check out our Spring 2020 updates including 'SwarmMinder' updates for your BroodMinder-T2 devices. Watch the video
RESOURCES.DESCRIPTION_2: Sincere thanks to Google and to WeatherSource.com for their generous support of BroodMinder Citizen Science.

APIARY_PAGE.PREMIUM_EXP: Time range selection for this view available with premium subscription.

TEXT.TITLE: Text
TEXT.DESCRIPTION: This view displays the most recent reading uploaded for every position in every hive.

HIVE.TITLE: Hive
HIVE.DESCRIPTION: This view displays a quick chart view for every hive. Weight display precedence: heaviest value. Humidity and temperature display precedence: 1-Above Lower Brood Box 2-Above Upper Brood Box 3-Under Inner Cover 4-Other 5-Custom (highest value) 6-Outside Hive 7-Scale Under Hive

SUMMARY.TITLE: Summary
SUMMARY.DESCRIPTION: This view displays combined charts by data type. Specifics shown follow the defaults of the hive view, but can be set per hive in the hive settings.
SUMMARY.PREMIUM_EXP: This view available with premium subscription. Example shown below.

PRODUCTIVITY.TITLE: Honeybee Productivity

HUMID.DESCRIPTION: Humidity device to graph in multi-select mode

HUMID.ALL: Show all humidity devices in multi-select mode

BATTERY.ALL: Show all devices in multi-select mode

You are helping researchers around the world learn about and develop interventions for our precious honeybees and our environment.
BEECOUNTED.EXPIRED: Premium membership elapsed. Data is private only before {{end}}.

PH.INFO:
Share your sensor data with Bee Life association through the European Union Pollinator Hub to improve pollinator policy by leveraging advanced technology and data-driven insights collected by beekepers.

The data being shared:
- all devices in this apiary with their raw measurements.
- a rough location of the apiary based on postal code.

Data is sent daily to BeeLife.

O1.MSG: Weak hive or in strong decrease

ALERTS_DESC.HONEYDEW_DESC: Triggered when the weight contribution to the hive exceeds the chosen threshold during the last week.
ALERTS_DESC.RAIN_DESC: Triggered when rainfall exceeds the chosen threshold on the next day.
ALERTS_DESC.SWARM_DESC: Triggered when a potential swarm has occurred (Hub offers more efficiency).
ALERTS_DESC.DCONNECT_DESC: Triggered when one of your sensors no longer transmits data (or punctually) during each chosen period. Only works with a Hub.
ALERTS_DESC.TMAX_DESC: Triggered when the internal temperature exceeds the chosen threshold.
ALERTS_DESC.TMIN_DESC: Triggered when the internal temperature is below the chosen threshold.
ALERTS_DESC.LOWBROOD_DESC: Triggered when the percentage of brood is below the chosen threshold.
ALERTS_DESC.STOPWEATHER_DESC: Triggered when your weather station stops transmitting data. Requires its own weather station.
ALERTS_DESC.RSWARM_DESC: Triggered when the risk of swarm is high on one of your hives on the next day.
ALERTS_DESC.WIPOS_DESC: Triggered when the incoming weight of the day in the hive exceeds the chosen threshold.
ALERTS_DESC.WINEG_DESC: Triggered when bees consume many more resources than they bring back to the hive. The loss threshold is adjustable.
ALERTS_DESC.WLIM_DESC: Triggered when the indicated weight threshold is exceeded.
ALERTS_DESC.SNOW_DESC: Triggered when snowfall exceeds the chosen threshold on the next day.
ALERTS_DESC.WIND_DESC: Triggered when the wind exceeds the chosen threshold on the next day.
ALERTS_DESC.COLDDAY_DESC: Triggered when an upcoming cold day is detected, i.e. below the specified temperature threshold.
ALERTS_DESC.HOTDAY_DESC: Triggered when an upcoming hot day is detected, i.e. above the specified temperature threshold.
ALERTS_DESC.HMIN_DESC: Triggered when the internal humidity is below the chosen threshold.
ALERTS_DESC.HMAX_DESC: Triggered when the internal humidity exceeds the chosen threshold.
ALERTS_DESC.STOLEN_DESC: Triggered when the weight of your hive becomes abnormally low.
ALERTS_DESC.DCONNECTT_DESC: Triggered when your T sensor no longer transmits data during the last day.
ALERTS_DESC.DCONNECTW_DESC: Triggered when your W sensor no longer transmits data during the last day.
ALERTS_DESC.DCONNECTH_DESC: Triggered when your Hub no longer transmits data during the last day.
ALERTS_DESC.POORSIGNALW_DESC: Triggered when your W sensor transmits little data during the last day.
ALERTS_DESC.POORSIGNALT_DESC: Triggered when your T sensor transmits little data during the last day.
ALERTS_DESC.LOWBATTERYW_DESC: Triggered when the battery level of your W sensor is below the selected threshold.
ALERTS_DESC.LOWBATTERYT_DESC: Triggered when the battery level of your T sensor is below the selected threshold.
ALERTS_DESC.SUPER+_DESC: Indicate the minimum weight of an empty super.
ALERTS_DESC.SUPER-_DESC: Indicate the maximum weight of a full super.
ALERTS_DESC.OXALIC_DESC: Triggered when the average brood in your hives is below the set threshold. This is an indication that allows you to treat your hives with oxalic acid at the right time.
ALERTS_DESC.DEAD_DESC: Our algorithm detects every day if your hive is dead based on various parameters we have set.
ALERTS_DESC.OXALIC_MSG: It's time to treat your hives
ALERTS_DESC.WIPOS_MSG: The gain of your bees' stock exceeds {VAL}
ALERTS_DESC.WINEG_MSG: The loss of your bees' stock exceeds {VAL}
ALERTS_DESC.HONEYDEW_MSG: Incoming weights during the last week exceeding {VAL}
ALERTS_DESC.WLIM_MSG: The weight of your hive exceeds {VAL}
ALERTS_DESC.STOPWEATHER_MSG: Data transmission error from your weather station since {DATE}
ALERTS_DESC.STOLEN_MSG: The weight of your hive is abnormally low
ALERTS_DESC.DEAD_MSG: Your hive has been detected dead
ALERTS_DESC.REALTIME_SWARM_ALERT: Temperature event calculated by T2 device. Only notified for devices above or below brood boxes using a realtime hub.

CONFIGURE_ALERTS.FREQUENCY_DAILY: Alert summary email sent every day
CONFIGURE_ALERTS.FREQUENCY_WEEKLY: Alert summary email sent every week

START.TITLE: New and Improved MyBroodMinder!
START.TEXT: Welcome to the new and improved MyBroodMinder! We have added new features, charts, and data. Learn more here.

HOME.TITLE: Home Page
HOME.TEXT: Visit the home page to view an overview of your active hives and apiaries.

HIVE.TITLE: View a hive
HIVE.TEXT_1: Click on a hive name to view it on a dashboard.
HIVE.TEXT_2: Click on the hive again to remove it.

MULTI.TITLE: Enable Multi-Select
MULTI.TEXT: Click multi-select to display multiple hives at once.

APIARY.TITLE: Click Apiary
APIARY.TEXT: Click an apiary to add or remove its hives from your display.

DASHBOARDS.TITLE: New Views and Visualizations!
DASHBOARDS.TEXT: Click on a dashboard name to view your data in different ways!

NEW.TITLE: Custom Dashboards
NEW.TEXT: Create your own dashboard. Add and arrange charts to suit your needs.

CHART_FILTER.TITLE: Chart Filters
CHART_FILTER.TEXT_2: Click to remove and add data to your chart.

DATE.TITLE: Date Range
DATE.TEXT: Select date range and optionaly show forecast.

CONF.TITLE: Advanced Options
CONF.TEXT: Click configure to view more advanced options.

CONF_ALERT.TITLE: Advanced Alert Options
CONF_ALERT.TEXT: Edit alert settings, email, and frequency.

HIVE_COLOR.TITLE: Customize Hive Color
HIVE_COLOR.TEXT_1: Edit your hive to change the hive color. This is customizable so you can easily view multiple hives on the same dashboard.
HIVE_COLOR.TEXT_2: This can also be done for each of your apiaries to specify the weather color.

END.TITLE: That's All
END.TEXT_1: For more help and information view our documentation.

EMPTY.TEXT_1: Welcome to MyBroodMinder! This is the home page!
EMPTY.TEXT_2: This is a quick view for your hives and apiaries. Hives and apiaries are displayed here if they are active with devices assigned.
EMPTY.TEXT_3: Shared apiaries are not shown here.
EMPTY.TEXT_4: It appears you have nothing fitting this description.
EMPTY.TEXT_LI_1B: on the top left to add hives, apiaries, and devices to your account
EMPTY.TEXT_LI_2: Or download BroodMinder Bees app to manage them too.
